name: create-fullstack-monorepo
description: A fullstack TypeScript monorepo template with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.frontend:dev: pnpm --filter shared watch:index & pnpm --filter frontend dev
scripts.frontend:build: pnpm --filter shared watch:index & pnpm --filter frontend build
scripts.frontend:preview: pnpm --filter shared watch:index & pnpm --filter frontend preview
scripts.backend:dev: pnpm --filter shared watch:index & pnpm --filter backend dev
scripts.backend:build: pnpm --filter shared watch:index & pnpm --filter backend build
scripts.backend:start: pnpm --filter shared watch:index & pnpm --filter backend start
